name: Brawl of The Memes
description:
Beat Them All Up!

Fight With Mister Memed, Tera, Pico, Me, Female Spy From TF2, Grand Duchess Heavy Also From TF2, Demoflower, A TF2 Memes, And Many More

Instructions : 

>Character select:

>P1:

E - select

Q - cancel

W,A,S,D - move coin

>P2:

M - select

N - cancel

Arrow keys - move coin

>In-Game:

>P1:

W,A,S,D - move

E - neutrall attack

Q - Special attack

Q + A/D - side special

Q + W - up special

Q + S - down special

E + A/D - smash

>P2:

Arrow Keys- move

N - neutrall attack

M - Special attack

M + Left/Right arrow - side special

M + up arrow - up special

M + down arrow - down special

N + Left/Right arrow - smash
